attr.title: Coin Crypt
attr.desc: A roguelite deckbuilding adventure game about magical coins. You play as a lootmancer, who can unlock the hidden power inside of coins and use them in magical duels. The loots you take from chests and enemies also become your next moves, so plan carefully!
attr.inst: Purchase the game from steam or humble. Download the game and place the game files in coincrypt/gamedata
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game from [steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/264690/Coin_Crypt/) or [humble](https://www.humblebundle.com/store/coin-crypt). Download the game and place the game files in coincrypt/gamedata
